first_para: David Alan Heyes (born 2 April 1946) is a British Labour Party politician who was Member of Parliament (MP) for Ashton under Lyne from 2001 to 2015.

full.extract: David Alan Heyes (born 2 April 1946) is a British Labour Party politician who was Member of Parliament (MP) for Ashton under Lyne from 2001 to 2015.
full.title: David Heyes
